page.title: 02ADMINISTRATION
page.content: Usk was granted its charter in the 14 th. century and it was a royal charter. There are only 2{royal {charters.}The one is Usk the other one is Laugharne, in West Wales. It means that the leader of Usk would be called a{port reave}but it has lapsed and it would cost too much to be reinstated. The town council offices are at Old Market St. The town council meets at the{Court House}in Maryport St. and has meeings every two weeks. The town council discusses: roads, rubbish collection, car parks, almost everything. There are twelve councllors.
